title: Never Tomorrow
description: A church explodes... Virginia runs... and falls.Suddenly she can't remember anything: not even her real name! Virginia has an American accent, but is alone in Sydney. Where are her parents? Why does she insist she is Australian? Why was she outside the church when the bombs went off? And why is she so afraid now?Virginia's life is in danger. People wearing funny clothes keep trying to kidnap her and someone sends her a letter bomb! She only feels relaxed when she's with the beautiful bay mare: after all, she has no reason to trust people.Could she have been a member of a strange religious cult? Why are they after her now?
author: Nan Hunt
